page.title: 15LIFESTYLES IN MAWNAN
page.content: Here are the results of a recent {survey}amongst 103 school children. 67% had 1 bro or sis, 24% had 2 only 5% had none.In some cases parents had remarried and 5% had step bro or sis. Most children have cats and dogs but the older childen have goldfish that thay won last year.Most young children {play}in the garden with the older children playing in the playing fields. Older children go to bed at 9.00 pm and they enjoyed watching adult{TV programmes}like THE YOUNG ONES. The younger ones go to bed at 8.30pm. The younger children liked watching cartoons and Streethawk. The older ones watch more T.V. The younger children go farther away 18 out of 30 went to France last year for their{holidays}.The younger ones like children liked junk{food}-chips ,beans etc older ones liked salad and Chinese
